Example deep_mutational_scan objects

Source: R/data.R
deep_scans.Rd

A list of deep_mutational_scan objects. This dataset is primarily used to illustrate use of the package functions. The studies were sourced from https://www.mavedb.orgMaveDB.

deep_scans

Format

A list of deep_mutational_scan objects

hsp90

HSP90 scan by Hietpas et al. (2011, doi: 10.1073/pnas.1016024108, MaveDB: urn:mavedb:00000011-a-1)

gpa

GpA scan by Elazar et al. (2016, doi: 10.7554/eLife.12125, MaveDB: urn:mavedb:00000051-c-1)

p53

p53 scan by Kotler et al. (2018, doi: 10.1016/j.molcel.2018.06.012 , MaveDB: urn:mavedb:00000059-c-1)
